message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a one-of-a-kind product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $15000.
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
